required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study on the Epidemiology and Testing of Human Epidermal Growth Factor-Receptor 2 (HER2) in Breast Cancer in Germany
clinical_study.official_title: A Non-interventional Study on the Epidemiology and Testing of HER2 in Breast Cancer in Germany

brief_summary.textblock: This non-interventional study will collect data from routine diagnostics on HER2 testing of breast cancer in Germany.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Carcinoma Subtype (No Special Type\Ductal, Lobular, Other Special Type)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Sample Extraction (Biopsy versus Resectate)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Tumor-Node-Metastasis (TNM) Classification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Sample Source (Primary Tumor, Local Lymph Nodes, Metastasis)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Applied Method of Tissue Fixation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Testing Platform
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Automation of Testing
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Antibody Clone Antibody or Test Certification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Scoring Algorithm
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Round Robin Tests
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Institute's Accreditation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Institute's Certification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Tumor Grading
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Participant Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HER2 Positive Samples by Hormone Receptor Status
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day (this is a single time point study)

arm_group.description: Data on the epidemiology and HER2 testing of breast cancer will be collected from pathology routine diagnostics.

study_pop.textblock: Breast cancer tissue samples from participants in Germany

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Samples derived from men and women of age greater than or equal to (>/=) 18 years
- Samples derived from participants with any stage of histologically confirmed invasive breast cancer with HER2 diagnostics performed within routine (histo-)pathological workup or
- (Histo-)Pathological work-up of the tumor sample as at or after start of this study
- Available information on the year of birth of the participant
- No pre-selection of tumor samples is allowed. Tumor samples have to be documented consecutively in the order of their (histo-)pathological work-up.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Sample derived from participants with any stage of breast cancer with no HER2 diagnostics performed at the time of routine (histo-)pathological work-up.
- Samples derived prior to the start of this study.
